comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Marjorie Augusta Vreeland (1892-1985), daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Herbert Harold Vreeland of New York, married George Edward Von Gal (1893-1961) of Danbury CT in June 1916. Her father was a railroad executive. They had four sons together (their eldest son George Edward Von Gal Jr. held a handful of industrial patents). ginvongal.com/vvg2.htm
